com.github.erchu.beancp

Class MapperBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.erchu.beancp.MapperBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MappingInfo

    public final class MapperBuilder
extends Object
implements MappingInfo
    Builds mapper implementation. This class is not thread-safe.

    • Method Detail

      • addMap

        public <S,D> MapperBuilder addMap(Class<S> sourceClass,
                                  Class<D> destinationClass,
                                  DeclarativeMapSetup<S,D> mapConfiguration)
                           throws MapperConfigurationException
        Adds new mapping defined by map. Both source and destination classes must:
        • Must have default (no argument) public or protected constructor. This requirement is valid even if destination object builder is provided by DeclarativeMap.constructDestinationObjectUsing(java.util.function.Supplier) method.
        • Cannot be final
        • Cannot be inner non-static classes.
        Type Parameters:
        S - source object class.
        D - destination object class.
        Parameters:
        sourceClass - source object class.
        destinationClass - destination object class.
        mapConfiguration - map configuration.
        Returns:
        this (for method chaining)
        Throws:
        MapperConfigurationException

      • addConverter

        public <S,D> MapperBuilder addConverter(Class<S> sourceClass,
                                        Class<D> destinationClass,
                                        Function<S,D> convertionAction)
                                 throws MapperConfigurationException
        Adds new mappings implemented by converter.
        Type Parameters:
        S - source object class.
        D - destination object class.
        Parameters:
        sourceClass - source object class.
        destinationClass - destination object class.
        convertionAction - converter action, must be thread-safe.
        Returns:
        this (for method chaining)
        Throws:
        MapperConfigurationException

      • addMapAnyByConvention

        public MapperBuilder addMapAnyByConvention(MapConvention... conventions)
                                    throws MapperConfigurationException
        If two data types has no mapping defined by addMap(java.lang.Class, java.lang.Class, com.github.erchu.beancp.DeclarativeMapSetup) or any of addConverter methods then this convention will be used.
        Parameters:
        conventions - convention to add.
        Returns:
        this (for method chaining)
        Throws:
        MapperConfigurationException

      • buildMapper

        public Mapper buildMapper()
        Creates map implementation from definitions. After executed no other methods can be executed on this instance.
        Returns:
        map implementation.
